body.p: In March 2009 the IASB published an Exposure Draft Derecognition (Proposed amendments to IAS 39 and IFRS 7) (the ‘2009 Derecognition Exposure Draft’). In June 2009 the IASB held public round tables in North America, Asia and Europe to discuss the proposals in the 2009 Derecognition Exposure Draft. In addition to the round tables, the IASB undertook an extensive outreach programme with users, preparers, regulators, auditors, trade associations and others.
